# Dugmaren Brightmantle
## Overview
**Name:** Dugmaren Brightmantle

**Gender:** m

**Rank:** Lesser Deity

**Areas of Concern/Portfolio:** Scholarship, Discovery, Invention

**Titles:** The Gleam in the Eye, The Wandering Tinker, The Errant Explorer

**Holy Symbol:** Open book

**Alignment:** CG (NG)

**Origin of Worship:** Dwarf

**Core Worshippers:** Dwarves

**Uncommon Worshippers:**

**Favored Weapon(s):** Short sword (m)

**Other Preferred Weapons:**
